title: Feature Quality Standards
description: Quality criteria for evaluating feature pre-planning answers

criteria.description: How clear and specific is the feature description?
criteria.excellent: Feature is clearly described with specific, actionable details
criteria.good: Feature is mostly clear with minor ambiguity
criteria.acceptable: Feature is somewhat clear but could be more specific
criteria.needs_improvement: Feature description is vague or confusing
criteria.inadequate: Feature description is unclear or missing

criteria.description: How well-crafted is the user story?
criteria.excellent: User story follows proper format and clearly explains value
criteria.good: User story is well-crafted with minor issues
criteria.acceptable: User story is adequate but could be improved
criteria.needs_improvement: User story is poorly written or incomplete
criteria.inadequate: User story is missing or doesn't follow format

criteria.description: How comprehensive are the acceptance criteria?
criteria.excellent: Acceptance criteria are specific, testable, and comprehensive
criteria.good: Acceptance criteria are mostly complete with minor gaps
criteria.acceptable: Acceptance criteria are adequate but could be more detailed
criteria.needs_improvement: Acceptance criteria are incomplete or vague
criteria.inadequate: Acceptance criteria are missing or inadequate

criteria.description: How clear is the user workflow?
criteria.excellent: User workflow is detailed, logical, and easy to follow
criteria.good: User workflow is clear with minor gaps
criteria.acceptable: User workflow is basic but understandable
criteria.needs_improvement: User workflow is unclear or illogical
criteria.inadequate: User workflow is missing or confusing

criteria.description: How sound is the technical approach?
criteria.excellent: Technical approach is well-thought-out and feasible
criteria.good: Technical approach is solid with minor concerns
criteria.acceptable: Technical approach is basic but workable
criteria.inadequate: Technical approach is missing or unfeasible

criteria.description: How well are affected components identified?
criteria.excellent: All affected components are identified with clear impact

criteria.description: How well are edge cases considered?
criteria.excellent: Comprehensive edge case analysis with mitigation strategies
criteria.good: Good edge case consideration with minor gaps
criteria.inadequate: Edge cases not considered or identified

criteria.description: How comprehensive is the testing strategy?
criteria.excellent: Testing strategy covers all levels and scenarios
criteria.acceptable: Testing strategy is basic but adequate
criteria.inadequate: Testing strategy is missing or inadequate

criteria.description: How well is risk management addressed?
criteria.excellent: Comprehensive rollback plan with clear procedures
criteria.good: Good rollback plan with minor gaps
criteria.inadequate: Rollback plan is missing or inadequate

recommendations.excellent: Excellent feature planning! You're ready to proceed with implementation.
recommendations.good: Good feature planning with minor areas for improvement. Consider refining the highlighted areas before proceeding.
recommendations.acceptable: Acceptable feature planning but several areas need more detail. Please address the feedback before implementing.
recommendations.needs_improvement: The feature planning needs significant improvement. Please revise your answers based on the feedback provided.
recommendations.inadequate: The feature planning is inadequate. Please start over and provide more detailed, thoughtful answers.
